title: Ralph setup wizard and config-driven runtime
description: brew install ralph runs setup wizard that configures runtime (bash/bun), notifications, max iterations, model routing. All stored in config.json - no flags needed, just run 'ralph'.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Wizard asks: Runtime preference (bash simple / bun full UI)
Wizard asks: Enable ntfy notifications? (topic name)
Wizard asks: Model routing (use defaults or customize)
ralph command reads config.runtime to choose bash/bun
brew install ralph triggers wizard on first run
Add ralph-setup command to re-run wizard anytime
Test: Config changes respected without flags
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
